DOC.brief_title: Core Stabilization Treatment Anterior Knee Pain
DOC.criteria: Subjects 1320 year age clinically diagnose anterior knee pain . Pain peripatellar include least 3 follow : 1. experience activity 2. prolong sit 3. stair climb descend 4. squat 5. kneeling . The subject active least 30 minute per day .
